module.name: product_and_manufacturing_information_with_nominal_3d_models
module.name.french: Produit et information de fabrication avec des modèles 3D nominaux

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the identification of the nominal 3D model of a part.

inscope.li: identification of nominal 3D models of parts;
items within the scope of application module Advanced boundary representation, ISO/TS 10303-1514;
items within the scope of application module Construction geometry, ISO/TS 10303-1131;
items within the scope of application module Manifold subsurface, ISO/TS 10303-1702;
items within the scope of application module Manifold surface, ISO/TS 10303-1509;
items within the scope of application module Product and manufacturing information view context, ISO/TS 10303-1810;
items within the scope of application module Shape property assignment, ISO/TS 10303-1032.
